column4: hi, please how can i move in text mode? mouse wheel won't work
you mean scrollback?
Shift-PgUp/PgDown
I've never heard of horizonal scrolling in a tty
are you on a framebuffer console?
that's cause usually screens are bigger than the usual tty wide format, but this is smaller haha
are you on a framebuffer though?
or standard vga text mode?
lsmod
fbcon
what  should i do? i have fbcon              4612      0
hmm
that's a good question
perhaps disable fbcon
might want to look into fbset
shouldn't. it should just use standard text mode vga instead
i get WARNING: ALl config files need .conf: /etc/modprobe.d/oss-compat, it will be ignored in a future release.
looks pretty harmless'
I'm not sure disabling fbcon is the best way out
as I said, look into fbset
if you still do want to disable fbcon, then you need to add it to the modules blacklist
